Reviews.Title: constantly rebooting...
Reviews.Author: Art Shoppe "art shop."
Reviews.Content: couldn't make it work. it goes into reboot and off-line (both wireless and wired)return.no support phone number listed anywhere. there are other products very similar on the market with support and web sites.
